price: “Allaah’n kakadhee! Ani erga isin dugda gara galtanii deemtan booda dhugumatti, tooftaan ittiin taabotoota keessan (mancaasun) qopheeffadha” (of keessatti jedhe).
arabic: وَتَٱللَّهِ لَأَكِيدَنَّ أَصۡنَٰمَكُم بَعۡدَ أَن تُوَلُّواْ مُدۡبِرِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: watal-lahi la-akīdanna aṣnāmakum baʿda an tuwallū mud'birīna
